results.description: Norway's Marit Bjorgen wins gold in the women's cross country mass start, the eighth gold of her career and 15th medal overall, in the final event of the Winter Olympics.

results.description: Alexander Bolshunov reacts angrily to winning silver after struggling to keep pace with Finland's Iivo Niskanen in the men's 50km mass start classic cross-country ski race.

results.description: Finland's Iivo Niskanen wins his first individual Winter Olympic gold medal in the men's 50km cross country skiing mass start.
results.title: Winter Olympics: Finland's Iivo Niskanen takes 50km cross country gold

results.description: The United States win gold in the women's team sprint free as Norway's Marit Bjorgen becomes the most decorated Winter Olympian of all time.
results.shortTitle: Bjorgen makes history as USA win gold
results.title: Winter Olympics: Marit Bjorgen becomes most decorated Winter Olympian as USA win gold

results.description: Johannes Hosflot Klabo picks up his third gold medal in Pyeongchang as Norway win the men's team sprint free.

results.title: Winter Olympics: Norway's Johannes Hosflot Klabo wins third gold of Games in team sprint

thumbnail.altText: Norway's Martin Johnsrud Sundby and Johannes Hosflot Klabo

results.description: Johannes Hosflot Klabo claims his third gold of the Winter Olympics as he helps Norway to victory in the men's cross country team sprint.

results.title: Winter Olympics 2018: Klabo claims third gold as Norway win men's cross country team sprint

thumbnail.altText: Johannes Hoesflot Klaebo and Martin Johnsrud Sundby

results.description: Norway's Marit Bjorgen becomes the most decorated Winter Olympian of all time taking bronze in the women's team sprint free, as the United States' Jess Diggins wins gold on the final straight.
results.shortTitle: Norway's Bjorgen creates history as USA win women's team gold
results.title: Winter Olympics 2018: Norway's Marit Bjorgen creates history as USA win women's team cross country gold

results.description: Togolese cross-country skier Mathilde-Amivi Petitjean says more Africans should compete in the Winter Olympics.
results.title: More Africans should try winter sports, says Togolese cross-country skier

results.description: Johannes Hoesflot Klaebo powers Norway to their fifth gold in eight cross-country skiing competitions after charging home to win by 9.4 seconds in the men's 4x10km team relay final.
results.shortTitle: Norway power to fifth cross-country gold
results.title: Winter Olympics: Norway claim fifth cross-country skiing gold by winning the men's 4x10km team relay

thumbnail.altText: Norway's Simen Hegstad Krueger and Johannes Hoesflot Klaebo celebrate after winning the gold medal in the men's 4x10km relay cross-country skiing
